objects.specification: An enclosed indoor classroom space defined by four vertical walls, a flat floor and overhead ceiling, all painted matte white with subtle accent trim near the ceiling to create a bright and welcoming atmosphere. The proportions support comfortable circulation aisles and accommodate furnishings for sixteen students plus teacher. The simplicity of the structural finishes emphasizes neutrality and adaptability for educational activities.

A flat rectangular floor panel covering the entire interior footprint of the room, surfaced with light-toned wood laminate flooring featuring subtle grain patterns. The finish is smooth and low-gloss to optimize durability and reflect ambient light softly. It provides a continuous, cleanable surface ideal for a classroom environment.

A vertical planar front wall painted matte white with a slim accent trim along its upper edge. The surface is smooth and unbroken except for the mounted equipment area, offering a neutral backdrop for instructional aids. It is designed to frame the teacher’s workspace and display surfaces.

A vertical planar back wall with a clean matte white finish and minimalistic trim accent near the ceiling. The smooth surface serves as a neutral backdrop for storage furniture and reduces visual clutter. It supports mounted bookshelves and may bear light decorative elements.

A side wall painted in bright white with a narrow accent border at the top. The surface remains largely uninterrupted to allow for mounting educational posters and charts. It offers a luminous appearance to enhance ambient glow.

A side wall finished in matte white with subtle accent trim, designed to receive mounted window units and decorative elements. The clean surface maximizes light reflection and provides a neutral backdrop for wall-mounted materials.

A single-panel wooden door with a natural wood-stain finish, featuring a rectangular minimalistic design and a simple metal handle. The door is flush-mounted within the wall opening and complements the light wood tones used elsewhere. It provides secure access while maintaining the classroom’s bright aesthetic.

A rectangular window unit with a slim white-painted frame and clear safety glass pane. The design maximizes natural light entry and maintains unobstructed outward views. The unit is recessed slightly for a flush interior finish.

A matching rectangular window assembly with thin white framing and tempered glass, allowing consistent daylight illumination. The unit is fitted flush with the interior wall for a clean modern appearance.

A larger executive-style teacher desk featuring a darker wood grain finish across a spacious rectangular tabletop supported by solid panel legs. The design includes a modesty panel and a smooth surface that withstands daily classroom use. It provides ample workspace for instructional materials and technology equipment.

A plush swivel office chair upholstered in a neutral dark fabric with padded seat and back cushions, integrated armrests and adjustable height mechanism. The five-star base with smooth casters ensures easy mobility and ergonomic support for the teacher.

A large dark green chalkboard inset flush into the front wall, framed by thin wooden edging along all sides. The smooth matte surface is optimized for chalk contrast and easy erasing. It spans sufficient width for projected annotations and teacher writing.

A compact white ceiling-mounted projector with a smooth rectangular housing, integrated cooling vents and a centrally placed lens oriented toward the front wall. The minimalist design complements the ceiling lights and provides crisp image projection onto the board area.

A tall wooden bookshelf finished in a medium wood tone, comprising five evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted colorful books of varying heights. The back panel is solid and the shelf edges are rounded for safety. The unit stands flush against the wall and provides ample storage.

A matching medium-tone wood bookshelf with uniform shelf spacing and rounded front edges, loaded with a diverse selection of textbooks and novels. The sturdy construction ensures stability and complements the classroom’s wood accents.

A third identical wooden bookshelf once more featuring medium-tone shelving filled with educational volumes. Each shelf is deep enough to accommodate upright books and teaching materials, and the design aligns with the other storage units for cohesive aesthetics.

A circular recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted diffuser, mounted flush to the ceiling. The design emits uniform bright white illumination and complements the ambient lighting scheme. It features a slim bezel for a low-profile appearance.
A matching circular recessed LED fixture with frosted lens and slim metal trim, providing consistent brightness across the classroom. The unit is centered above desk aisles to optimize task lighting.
An identical recessed ceiling light with frosted cover and low-profile round housing, aligned over rear desk zones. The fixture blends seamlessly into the ceiling plane.
A fourth circular recessed LED fixture providing balanced overhead illumination, featuring a frosted lens and thin bezel to maintain a clean ceiling aesthetic.

An educational poster printed on matte paper featuring vibrant colors and graphical illustrations of academic concepts. It is mounted flat against the wall using slim white backing to minimize visual intrusion.
A second educational poster showcasing colorful charts and diagrams, mounted flush with a minimal frame. The paper stock has a subtle texture that reduces glare under overhead lighting.
A third poster with educational illustrations, printed on durable poster stock and surrounded by a thin white border to coordinate with wall accents. It adds visual interest and instructional value.
A fourth educational poster printed in high resolution, attached neatly with an invisible mount. The graphic design uses complementary hues to enliven the classroom.

A laminated informational chart featuring educational diagrams and statistical data, framed by a narrow white border. The surface is semi-gloss for durability and easy cleaning under classroom conditions.
A second laminated chart displaying reference information in vivid printed color, mounted with subtle fixtures. The chart’s durable finish resists wear and marks.
A round analog wall clock with a clean white face, black numerals and slender black hands, enclosed in a thin metal frame. The design is minimalist for clear legibility across the room.
A cylindrical plastic waste bin in neutral grey, featuring smooth sides and an open top for easy disposal. The compact design fits unobtrusively near the teacher’s area.
A second grey cylindrical waste bin with a smooth interior and open rim, sized for light classroom refuse. It stands against the back wall for student convenience.

A decorative potted plant featuring lush green foliage arranged in a terracotta pot with realistic texture. The plant adds a touch of organic warmth and sits in the corner near the windows to benefit from natural light.

A simple rectangular student desk with a light wood veneer tabletop and slender metal legs finished in matte grey. The modesty panel beneath the surface offers structural support and the top surface displays subtle grain detail. Designed for individual study with a compact footprint.

A student chair featuring a pastel-colored plastic seat and backrest molded for ergonomic support, mounted on four slender metal legs painted matte grey. The color complements the light wood tone of the desks and the chair is sized to fit neatly under the desk.
